name: Replica Quadrone
languages: can understand Common but speaks only preprogrammed responses

traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
entries: The quadrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

traits.name: Disintegration
entries: If the quadrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The quadrone makes two fist attacks or four shortbow attacks.

actions.name: Fist
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
